verses.t: And I turned{H7725}, and lifted up{H5375} mine eyes{H5869}, and looked{H7200}, and, behold, there came{H3318} four{H702} chariots{H4818} out{H3318} from between two{H8147} mountains{H2022}; and the mountains{H2022} were mountains{H2022} of brass{H5178}.
In the first{H7223} chariot{H4818} were red{H122} horses{H5483}; and in the second{H8145} chariot{H4818} black{H7838} horses{H5483};
And in the third{H7992} chariot{H4818} white{H3836} horses{H5483}; and in the fourth{H7243} chariot{H4818} grisled{H1261} and bay{H554} horses{H5483}.bay: or, strong
Then I answered{H6030} and said{H559} unto the angel{H4397} that talked{H1696} with me, What are these, my lord{H113}?

And the angel{H4397} answered{H6030} and said{H559} unto me, These are the four{H702} spirits{H7307} of the heavens{H8064}, which go forth{H3318} from standing{H3320} before the Lord{H113} of all the earth{H776}.spirits: or, winds

The black{H7838} horses{H5483} which are therein go forth{H3318} into the north{H6828} country{H776}; and the white{H3836} go forth{H3318} after{H310} them; and the grisled{H1261} go forth{H3318} toward the south{H8486} country{H776}.

And the bay{H554} went forth{H3318}, and sought{H1245} to go{H3212} that they might walk to and fro{H1980} through the earth{H776}: and he said{H559}, Get you hence{H3212}, walk to and fro{H1980} through the earth{H776}. So they walked to and fro{H1980} through the earth{H776}.

Then cried{H2199} he upon{H853} me, and spake{H1696} unto me, saying{H559}, Behold{H7200}, these that go{H3318} toward the north{H6828} country{H776} have quieted{H5117} my spirit{H7307} in the north{H6828} country{H776}.
And the word{H1697} Lordof the {H3068} came unto me, saying{H559},

Take{H3947} of them of the captivity{H1473}, even of Heldai{H2469}, of Tobijah{H2900}, and of Jedaiah{H3048}, which are come{H935} from Babylon{H894}, and come{H935} thou the same day{H3117}, and go{H935} into the house{H1004} of Josiah{H2977} the son{H1121} of Zephaniah{H6846};

Then take{H3947} silver{H3701} and gold{H2091}, and make{H6213} crowns{H5850}, and set{H7760} them upon the head{H7218} of Joshua{H3091} the son{H1121} of Josedech{H3087}, the high{H1419} priest{H3548};

And speak{H559} unto him, saying{H559}, Thus speaketh{H559} Lordthe {H3068} of hosts{H6635}, saying{H559}, Behold the man{H376} whose name{H8034} is The BRANCH{H6780}; and he shall grow up{H6779} out of his place, and he shall build{H1129} the temple{H1964} Lordof the {H3068}:growâ€¦: or, branch up from under him

Even he shall build{H1129} the temple{H1964} Lordof the {H3068}; and he shall bear{H5375} the glory{H1935}, and shall sit{H3427} and rule{H4910} upon his throne{H3678}; and he shall be a priest{H3548} upon his throne{H3678}: and the counsel{H6098} of peace{H7965} shall be between them both{H8147}.

And the crowns{H5850} shall be to Helem{H2494}, and to Tobijah{H2900}, and to Jedaiah{H3048}, and to Hen{H2581} the son{H1121} of Zephaniah{H6846}, for a memorial{H2146} in the temple{H1964} Lordof the {H3068}.

And they that are far off{H7350} shall come{H935} and build{H1129} in the temple{H1964} Lordof the {H3068}, and ye shall know{H3045} Lordthat the {H3068} of hosts{H6635} hath sent{H7971} me unto you. And this shall come to pass, if ye will diligently{H8085}obey{H8085} the voice{H6963} Lordof the {H3068} your God{H430}.
